CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Polymer solar cell devices based on the blend films of PSFDTBT and PC71BM show a high open - circuit voltage of 0.94 V and a power conversion efficiency of 4.6% without any post-treatment.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. PSFDTBT: This is the name of the polymer material used in the blend film.
2. PC71BM: This is the name of the other material used in the blend film.

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. PSFDTBT
2. PC71BM
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, my apologies for including irrelevant entities earlier. Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph:

1. PSFDTBT
2. PC71BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |
| PC71BM |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Polymer solar cell devices based on the blend films of PSFDTBT and PC71BM show a high open - circuit voltage of 0.94 V and a power conversion efficiency of 4.6% without any post-treatment.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. PSFDTBT: This is a chemical compound, specifically a polymer, which is used in the blend film of the solar cell device.
2. PC71BM: This is another chemical compound, also a polymer, which is used in the blend film of the solar cell device.
3. open-circuit voltage (Voc): This is a property of the solar cell device, which represents the maximum voltage that the device can achieve when it is in an open-circuit configuration.
4. power conversion efficiency (η): This is another property of the solar cell device, which represents the ratio of the amount of electrical power produced by the device to the amount of light energy absorbed by it.

So, in summary, the "Property Name" entities in the given paragraph are:

1. PSFDTBT
2. PC71BM
3. Voc
4. η
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to material properties in the given paragraph:

1. PSFDTBT
2. PC71BM

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties, so I have removed the other entities from the list.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |
| PC71BM |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Polymer solar cell devices based on the blend films of PSFDTBT and PC71BM show a high open - circuit voltage of 0.94 V and a power conversion efficiency of 4.6% without any post-treatment.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Value" entities:

1. Open-circuit voltage (OCV): This is the voltage at which the solar cell is open-circuited and is equal to the voltage across the solar cell when there is no load connected. In this case, the OCV is 0.94 V.
2. Power conversion efficiency (PCE): This is the ratio of the output power to the input power of the solar cell, expressed as a percentage. In this case, the PCE is 4.6%.

So, the two "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are OCV and PCE.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure! Here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. Open-circuit voltage (OCV): This is the voltage at which the solar cell is open-circuited and is equal to the voltage across the solar cell when there is no load connected. In this case, the OCV is 0.94 V.
2. Power conversion efficiency (PCE): This is the ratio of the output power to the input power of the solar cell, expressed as a percentage. In this case, the PCE is 4.6%.

So, the two entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph are OCV and PCE.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Open-circuit voltage (OCV) | 0.94 V |
| Power conversion efficiency (PCE) | 4.6% |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
